descriptionSet.description: A young woman sits behind a table and writes a supply-order to Anand Singh & Co. on a writing pad. Her black hair is tied back, she wears a pink silk dress and holds spectacles in her hand. She wears some jewellery: some bracelets, a pearl necklace earrings and a ring on her right hand. The image is part of an advertisement calendar. It is surrounded by different emblems that represent various recommendations and awards won by the company.

inscription.text: With best Compliments from: Anand Singh & [...] (Gold Medalists.) Manufacturers of all kinds of: High Class Harmoniums. Egerton Road, DELHI.
Anand Singh & Co: Delhi. Please Supply:
Awarded to M-S. Anand Singh & Co. Delhi By Raja of Jaunpur 1927
Exhibition Meerut 1925 Anand Singh of Delhi
Muttra EXBN. 1925 Awarded to Anand Singh & Co. Delhi
M-S. Anand Singh & Co. Delhi By Seth Sat Narain of Delhi 1927
See our quality before you buy from elsewhere.
Anand Flute Best in the Market. Calendar for 1936.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: Calendar advertisement of Anand Singh & Co., showing an Indian woman on a writing desk
